Shadow

Add shadow elevation to an element with the shadow trait. Format z{number}, where numbers is 0-24.

Default styling
z1
Shadow elevation 1.
z5
Shadow elevation 5.
z10
Shadow elevation 10.
z15
Shadow elevation 15.
z20
Shadow elevation 20.
z24
Shadow elevation 24.
Markup 
<div pam-shadow="[modifier]" pam-space="p:4" pam-size="w:1-3 h:3"></div>
